title: Around Australia: lure of the Flinders
creator_contributor_role: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, production company
subject_group: Aboriginal Australia/Aboriginal Australians - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Flinders Ranges (S. Aust.)
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/South Australia - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Australia - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Wilpena Pound Region (S.Aust.)
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Human settlements
description: Depicts the beauty of the Flinders Range in South Australia. Tours Wilpena Pound, a great natural basin completely encircled by a massive mountain wall. Visits early settlents - Blinman, a thriving copper mining centre a century ago, and abandoned Kanyaka where mute evidence remains of pioneers' hardships. Features a carpet of wild flowers, fossils, rugged mountain scenery and aboriginal rock carvings.
